name: FormsForWeb Packet
summary: Learn about .FFWP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Lucom FormsForWeb is a form creation tool that allows businesses and others to create fillable forms. These forms can contain text, fillable fields, scripts that automatically fill in fields based on previous answers, images, and more.

After creating a form, users save that form as an FFWP file. They can then embed the FFWP file in a web application, to allow users who access the application to fill out the form. (These web applications typically save users' answers to a database.) Users can also distribute FFWP files offline, to allow others to fill out and submit the form without accessing the internet.

description: An FFWP file is a fillable form created by Lucom FormsForWeb, a form creation tool. Typically, FFWP files are embedded as part of web applications, in which users can fill out the form the file contains. However, users can also fill out FFWP forms offline with Lucom FormsForWeb Filler, a free Windows application.

instructions: You can open an FFWP file with Lucom FormsForWeb Filler (Windows), which is available primarily in German. To open an FFWP file, select Datei → Öffnen from FormsForWeb's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your FFWP file.
